rounds.category: U.S. PRESIDENTS:  WHERE ARE THEY NOW?

clues.text: Monticello, in Virginia

Pierre, not his tante, used this, a plume, when he invited you to the house

If you sample too much from Pierre's well-stocked wine cellar; you might end up on the plancher, this
As you're leaving, you're relieved that Pierre offers you this, his main & not the back of it
One of its nicknames is the "City of Paul Revere"
One of the world's largest pipe organs is found in the tabernacle in this state capital

It's been said that this grandson of Man O' War had more newspaper coverage in 1938 than any public figure
2 of the Triple Crown races, the Kentucky Derby & the Preakness, take place during this month

rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will be two words--the first word will have two "T"s in it. The second word will have only one "T".)
